author: Fextralife
description:
Fellowship Gameplay Preview - Should You Play It? Is It Worth It? (Early Access Launch)
In this Fextralife video, we're going to be talking about Fellowship, a game we actually touched on before that we had access to in the early alpha build back in August of 2024. If you caught that video, you might remember that we came away pretty intrigued by what the developers were trying to do. But for anyone new, Fellowship is what the developers are calling a Multiplayer Online Dungeon Adventure or MODA for short, and is being developed by Chief Rebel, a brand new studio made up of some pretty seasoned veterans. 

Timestamps

1:01 What is Fellowship
1:59 What makes Fellowship unique

3:20 Monetization

title: Fellowship Gameplay Preview - Should You Play It? Is It Worth It? (Early Access Launch)
